meanings.definition: relating to the skin patterns on the fingers and palms
meanings.sent1: The dermatoglyphic marks on her fingers were unique to her.
meanings.sent2: The dermatoglyphic analysis showed interesting patterns on the palms.
meanings.sent3: His dermatoglyphic fingerprints made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The dermatoglyphic intricacies on the palms resembled tiny mazes.
meanings.sent5: The dermatoglyphic details were like nature's own secret codes.

meanings.definition: the study of these skin patterns
meanings.sent1: She found the field of dermatoglyphic fascinating and informative.
meanings.sent2: The expert in dermatoglyphic helped solve the case with fingerprint analysis.
meanings.sent3: Studying dermatoglyphic felt like deciphering a mysterious language.
meanings.sent4: In the world of crime investigation, dermatoglyphic plays a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The book on dermatoglyphic opened up a whole new world of knowledge.
